entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016
